title: 166: Paula Faris, Journey of Faith
description:
You may know Paula Faris as the former co-host of ABC's The View or Dan's former co-anchor on ABC's Good Morning America weekend edition. What you don't know is why she decided to leave these TWO dream jobs, and the role that meditation and her faith played in that life-altering decision.
Have a question for Dan? Leave us a voicemail at 646-883-8326.
The Plug Zone
Check out Paula's podcast: Journeys of Faith
http://abcn.ws/journeys

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
